text: @ChrisLu44 @richardmarx Not only did the CCP silence its doctors, it took part in unleashing a pandemic on the world. It is in 150 countries- guess they all ignored the warnings too, huh? Why didn't WHO declare a pandemic till late in game- cause CCP has them in their pocket. Did you support travel ban?

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
